name: Rash!
description:
hi guys ! I'm Mr Wawa and I'm a big French player of lot of video game. And one days I had an idea. why not to create a game to? And this project is appared. You take possession of Rash, a little Morph, he want to be a ninja but he has need to found all the "colliseur" in the city to be better.

Find all the colliseur in this city.
For the moment its just a prototype game.
the next maj I add quests and a new world will be available.

Good game and thx for you feedback. Love U

                                                                                                       Mr Wawa
